faqs.question: How does the Texture Atlas feature work?
faqs.answer:
### Texture Atlas

[image]https://i.imgur.com/Mav3P9e.png[/image]

Texture atlas combines multiple textures into one to reduce draw calls and improve model performance.

#### Features:
- Create Atlas: Combines selected materials into one texture
- Generate Material List: Lists all materials for selection

#### Tips:
- Split transparent and non-transparent textures
- Keep textures under 2048x2048 for Unity
- Unity can support up to 8k textures with proper settings

[image]https://i.imgur.com/o01T4Gb.png[/image]

faqs.question: What bone optimization features are available?
faqs.answer:
### Bone Optimization Tools

[image]https://cdn.neoneko.xyz/catsblenderplugin/website/wiki/303692635-021a9a5e-22eb-44b2-8780-924720113571.png[/image]

#### Features:
- Bone Merging: Reduce overall bone count
- Merge Weights: Combines weights to parent bones
- Delete Zero Weight Bones: Removes unused bones
- Delete Constraints: Removes unused VRChat constraints
- Duplicate Bones: Creates _L/_R bone copies
- Connect Bones: Links bones to children
